entry.source: I have sent a group of my Celtic brethren to{F801}the world above to take back the {F804,5}Cauldron of{F801}Dagda,{F804,0} stolen from us by God. They did get{F801}the Cauldron, but they are injured and {F804,5}lost{F801}in the maze of Naraku.{F804,0} Please find them and{F801}bring the Cauldron to {F804,5}Brigid,{F804,0} who is in{F801}an area east of Tennozu called Daiba.{F801}
